title: Zimbabwe vs South Africa, 1st Test Day 1 Highlights: Lhuan-dre Pretorius, Corbin Bosch Tons Steer SA To 418/9 After Zim Bowlers Shine
description: Zimbabwe vs South Africa, 1st Test Day 1 Highlights: Lhuan-dre Pretorius and Corbin Bosch slammed centuries to help South Africa finish Day 1 of the 1st Test against Zimbabwe in Bulawayo at 418/9.
excerpt: Zimbabwe vs South Africa, 1st Test Day 1 Highlights: Lhuan-dre Pretorius and Corbin Bosch slammed centuries to help South Africa finish Day 1 of the 1st Test against Zimbabwe in Bulawayo at 418/9.
text: Zim vs SA 1st Test: Lhuan-dre Pretorius slammed a quickfire 153 (160).© AFP Zimbabwe vs South Africa, 1st Test Day 1 Highlights: Lhuan-dre Pretorius and Corbin Bosch slammed centuries to help South Africa finish Day 1 of the 1st Test against Zimbabwe in Bulawayo at 418/9. Pretorius slammed a quickfire 153 (160), hitting 11 fours and four sixes, after South Africa had collapsed to 55/4. He stitched a 95-run stand with Dewald Brevis (51) before the latter's dismissal in the 37th over. Bosch on unbeaten on 100 while Kwena Maphaka was also batting on 9 at the close of the day's play. Tanaka Chivanga was the pick of the bowlers for Zimbabwe, taking 4/83. (Scorecard) Topics mentioned in this article
html:
Zim vs SA 1st Test: Lhuan-dre Pretorius slammed a quickfire 153 (160).© AFP

Zimbabwe vs South Africa, 1st Test Day 1 Highlights: Lhuan-dre Pretorius and Corbin Bosch slammed centuries to help South Africa finish Day 1 of the 1st Test against Zimbabwe in Bulawayo at 418/9. Pretorius slammed a quickfire 153 (160), hitting 11 fours and four sixes, after South Africa had collapsed to 55/4. He stitched a 95-run stand with Dewald Brevis (51) before the latter's dismissal in the 37th over. Bosch on unbeaten on 100 while Kwena Maphaka was also batting on 9 at the close of the day's play. Tanaka Chivanga was the pick of the bowlers for Zimbabwe, taking 4/83. (Scorecard)

Topics mentioned in this article
